name: Give me my Hamburger!
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Theme: Joined together

Your friend is late for work and there are a lot of people who ordered different types of hamburgers. But you don't know which hamburgers they ordered. Thankfully, their personality and looks reveal what they want, so it's your job to try to connect the character to the hamburger combination they want.

Download the game for a better experience. (Some sound effects don't play in HTML. Use fullscreen if in HTML.)

Best played in 1920x1080

(Don't complain if you can't pass the last level. It's definitely not easy. But it is 100% possible.)
